data.caption: Clarification sought from Kothari Products Ltd
data.news_body:
The Exchange has sought clarification from Kothari Products Ltd on July 29, 2024 with reference to significant movement in price, in order to ensure that investors have latest relevant information about the company and to inform the market so that the interest of the investors is safeguarded.

The reply is awaited.
